explains: n. 调情；一时兴起，逢场作戏；短暂的风流韵事

sentences.en: At recess Tom continued his flirtation with Amy with jubilant self-satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 休息的时候，汤姆继续同艾美调情，一副兴高采烈，心满意足的样子。

sentences.en: She was aware of his attempts at flirtation.
Frank's efforts at flirtation had become tiresome to her.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克一个劲地打情骂俏使得她非常厌倦。
